tool.name: Gene List to EuPathDB
tool.description: Export a gene list to EuPathDB
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool obtains a gene list and from that, creates a valid EuPathDB dataset that may be exported to one or more EuPathDB project.
You need to provide a name for the dataset so that you may easily identify it in EuPathDB websites, along with a description and a summary, the project to which the dataset applies and of course, a gene list. All inputs are required.
-----
**Example**
Here is an example of a properly filled in form:
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/geneListToolDemo.png :height: 200 :width: 500
.. class:: warningmark
Recommend that the user only supply one dataset file at a time. The tool can run in batch mode, but the datasets could be very difficult to distinguish in EuPath as all the other parameters above will apply to every dataset.
